name: Twin Tiger Shark
description:
Twin Tiger Shark is a biplane STG/shmup/shooter with its roots in the 80s.

* Online Hiscores
* TATE (Wide Screen 16:9) and Control Rotation Support
* 6 Stages - Loop forever or just twice for a 2-ALL
* 3 Difficulty Settings
* 3 Weapon Types
* Helper Planes
* Smart Bombs
* No Continues

The game is a tribute to a well known STG company of the 80s and 90s.

This game requires that JAVA is installed.
